metadata.title: CVE-2013-1817 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
MediaWiki before 1.19.4 and 1.20.x before 1.20.3 contains an error in theapi.php script which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitiveinformation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1817` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.4-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.4-1').
